block.p: The decision to move to New York City remains both irrational and quasireligious. A special issue of The Times Magazine reports on more than a dozen people who made that decision a year ago, like a star athlete and Israeli dot-commers and a gay teenage runaway. In every case, New York was the place that people hoped would transform their lives.
Plus: Men's Fashions of The Times.
